original_text: Old people die and then their children live after them. But the earth continues and it never changes. Old people die and then their children live after them. But the earth continues and it never changes. Old people die and then their children live after them.
korean_text: 한 세대는 가고 한 세대는 오되 땅은 영원히 있도다

sentences.original_text: and then their children live after them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 자식들이 그들 뒤에 삽니다
